document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">They </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">might </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">need </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">yet </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">they </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">might </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'll </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">let </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">my </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Heart </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">sight </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">A </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">smile </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5080ff">small </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">might </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">Precisely </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5cffb4">necessity </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: They might not need me, yet they might
